Summary: Great gift for the foodie in your life!
Text: Last year I gave this along with Salt: Cooking with the World's Favorite Seasoning to my foodie friends and family. They all loved it! The salt tubes were well packaged and I ordered 10 sets and had no broken tubes. The package also came with salt samples which I really appreciate. I have Collection Sets 1 and 2 on my counter and get lots of comments about them when people visit.
